## Example R Analysis

Example text.
```{r}
sample1 <- rnorm(100, mean=0, sd=1)
sample2 <- rnorm(100, mean=0, sd=1)
sample3 <- rnorm(100, mean=0, sd=1)
samples <- cbind.data.frame(sample1, sample2, sample3)

hist(samples[,1])
hist(samples[,2])
hist(samples[,3])

```

```{r}
DT::datatable(samples, 
              rownames = FALSE, 
              filter="top", 
              options = list(pageLength = 5, scrollX=T) )
```
